answerText: Mount Mitchell [10] Mount Michell is located in the Black Mountains, a section of this segment of the Appalachian Mountains, which also includes Sassafras Mountain in South Carolina and Brasstown Bald in Georgia.
heading: ACF Winter |2009 | University of Illinois A and Missouri State A and University of South Carolina A | 4 | Geography | None | College
subject: Geography
question: Question: Known as Attakulla to the Cherokee, it was named for a University of North Carolina professor who fell to his death from it.  [10] Name this highest peak in the United States east of the Mississippi River.
